review_body: If you are feeling like a movie, this is a nice, clean multi-story movie theater in the midst of Seoul. Most movies are in English with subtitles so whether you are Korean or not you will enjoy the experience.

Don't be intimidated by the process of buying tickets. I used an english website to check the timing of the movie and proceeded to buy the tickets. 10000won / ticket. Cinema looks old. Luckily the cashier knows english well enough to let us know which floor and which theater to go to. Pro Tip: Movie starts on the dot. don't be late or you'll get a few tsks coming your way.
